Posts.Content: Great news, Ed. I too just received the news I am still in the zero club on my 2nd Post op PSA.....an old fashioned for me. Salut
Posts.Signature: DOB: 6/15/55 St. Louis August'15 PSA 10.0 February'15 biopsy negative May'16 PSA 10.2 8/11/16 biopsy 3+3 Gleason 6 (Johns Hopkins) 9/17/16 lupron injection for 6 months delay in surgery 3/30/17 davinci laparoscopic prostatectomy (Patel) PT2C, Gleason 3+4, 5% of gland, no lymph nodes 5/15/17 PSA <.1 8/15/17 PSA <.1

Posts.Title: Yes, Z Club

Posts.Content: Want to thank the members of this forum for the many posts that I have followed for the past year, after diagnosis, and pre and post op. Recently received my 6 week PSA of <.1. Still dealing with incontinence and ED and hopeful of winning the "Trifecta"
